title: Authors and Citation

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Quickly generate lorem ipsum placeholder text lorem::ipsum(). Easy integrate RMarkdown documents. Includes RStudio addin insert lorem ipsum current document.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: lorem includes simple addin RStudio adds placeholder lorem ipsum text current source document. addin allows specify number desired paragraphs sentences.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Another way generate lorem ipsum placeholder text call lorem::ipsum() inline R chunk R Markdown. Sit nunc convallis fringilla semper. Penatibus vivamus eget malesuada cursus fames magnis potenti. Venenatis ligula enim conubia laoreet orci, class ligula. Massa sem sed enim risus ut mattis inceptos nisl elementum mattis. Nostra ultricies habitant donec vitae luctus proin gravida placerat ac libero imperdiet! Auctor habitasse faucibus ultricies purus eget sociis ultrices habitasse: nec ad aptent lectus rutrum proin potenti, montes, sodales, posuere convallis tempor erat, egestas magna lectus sociis mollis purus. Dolor turpis euismod himenaeos interdum felis dictum tempus euismod tortor aliquam! Eget interdum vehicula laoreet quam mollis, justo cursus ad blandit feugiat pulvinar? Sem sodales bibendum leo leo magna pulvinar metus lacinia nam. Fringilla maecenas duis dis suscipit aenean natoque sem metus, quam risus sagittis convallis primis sociis id dictumst. can control number paragraphs sentences per paragraph. Amet cras primis ac neque primis dui scelerisque massa inceptos massa. Adipiscing netus cursus – vivamus est aliquam mauris pharetra: nostra ornare. Tristique ad consequat sagittis montes sociis, ut cursus tincidunt vitae sagittis netus! Adipiscing aptent libero vitae etiam tristique commodo iaculis erat mattis tempor convallis. Porta aenean natoque, feugiat himenaeos – ac accumsan mollis torquent ut maecenas congue vulputate nulla! Interdum fames. can also adjust avg_words_per_sentence create long short paragraphs. Elit facilisis curae pharetra quisque per? Euismod risus phasellus euismod velit, orci platea? Na platea. Amet posuere habitasse imperdiet. Porta tempor felis morbi. Est nam nisl litora viverra? Accumsan feugiat volutpat cubilia purus. Na purus. Elit venenatis tincidunt urna sagittis integer posuere dignissim. Dui tellus massa nam suspendisse venenatis dui nec imperdiet donec magna libero elementum euismod nibh ligula conubia vitae, ad egestas dis himenaeos ligula urna, dui parturient lacus montes semper ultricies euismod non condimentum porta sem luctus porttitor platea hac sagittis!

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Generate lorem ipsum anywhere else using lorem::ipsum() lorem::ipsum_words(). purus enim pellentesque blandit facilisis elementum interdum suscipit enim urna urna elementum nec vitae scelerisque scelerisque faucibus dignissim urna interdum curabitur porttitor dui euismod
code: ipsum_items <- replicate(5, lorem::ipsum_words(5)) cat(paste("-", ipsum_items), sep = "\n")

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Thank Luke Haas node module getlorem providing lorem ipsum word list used package.

what: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text:
Renders ipsum() placeholder text HTML tags using htmltools::.tags(). default, paragraphs rendering

tags htmltools::p(), may provide paragraph wrapper function. general, need manually call function, instead can just drop ipsum() text another htmltools::tag().

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
code: # S3 method for lorem as.tags(x, wrapper = NULL, ...)

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text: x Object converted. wrapper function takes character string paragraph chunk placeholder text returns htmltools::tag(). default, lorem ipsum text wrapped htmltools::p(). ... additional parameters.

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
code:
htmltools::div( lorem::ipsum(paragraphs = 3) ) #>
#>

Sit eleifend rutrum aliquam cursus viverra metus platea. Phasellus accumsan lectus nisl eleifend litora, dis himenaeos aenean ligula mus nisi. Eleifend dictum iaculis ornare malesuada quisque porta placerat iaculis metus proin consequat. Justo nisl fringilla nullam lacinia auctor, dictum leo: auctor euismod fusce imperdiet tempor, montes lacus!

#>

Adipiscing praesent natoque leo nam nullam, sagittis turpis. Vehicula sollicitudin purus urna sed – pretium, justo praesent, quisque platea dis magna? Dis justo sapien, dui sed tortor himenaeos. Quam sem rhoncus pellentesque hac facilisi aenean rutrum eu elementum phasellus accumsan per suscipit. Aliquet mollis primis ridiculus.

#>

Ipsum scelerisque torquent aenean magnis ornare facilisi – curabitur eros primis ac hendrerit eros. Accumsan nullam sed laoreet vel cras vel sem ac. Magna libero etiam ultrices maecenas dui venenatis habitasse sem. Nostra integer suscipit posuere, imperdiet nisl nisi platea mollis enim nulla. Montes nullam elementum nec ullamcorper potenti.

#>
htmltools::tags$ul( htmltools::as.tags( lorem::ipsum(paragraphs = 3, sentences = 1), wrapper = htmltools::tags$li ) ) #>
    #>
  • Amet arcu velit interdum curae ante sociis eu felis nibh cum fusce.
    • #>
  • Ipsum magnis nascetur litora facilisis pellentesque vitae quis litora mi interdum.
    • #>
  • Consectetur curabitur ut sociis parturient magna erat aptent ligula tortor phasellus.
    • #>

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: Generates lorem ipsum placeholder text requested number sentences paragraphs. can control number sentences per paragraph average number words per sentence, simply enter number desired paragraphs completely random experience. Note lorem::ipsum() uses random number generator sampling makes effort shield placeholder text generation main script, please use package temporary placeholder text.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
code: ipsum(paragraphs = 1, sentences = NULL, avg_words_per_sentence = 10)  ipsum_words(n, collapse = TRUE)  ipsum_starts(n)

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: paragraphs Number paragraphs text generate. sentences Number sentences per paragraph. NULL, random number sentences per paragraph (approximately 3-8) chosen. Alternatively, sentences can vector integers representing number sentences per paragraph. avg_words_per_sentence Number expected words per sentence. n Number words generate collapse words collapsed single string, separated spaces (default)? FALSE, chosen words returned character vector.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: character vector lorem ispum placeholder text, element vector paragraph text.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: ipsum(): Generate paragraphs sentences lorem ipsum text. ipsum_words(): Generate lorem ipsum words, without punctuation. ipsum_starts(): Generate lorem ipsum starting words.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: can influence, degree, amount punctuation included output using lorem.punctuation_valence option. global option number 0 1, FALSE disable punctuation altogether. value closer 1, punctuation included sentences. value closer 0, less punctuation inserted. default value 0.4.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
code: # 1 paragraph of text lorem::ipsum(1) #> <lorem> #> Consectetur quisque vitae at hac quis vulputate urna; tortor sed #> tempor. Eros curabitur eu varius in metus congue laoreet platea libero #> venenatis. Turpis est dapibus nulla purus fusce a ac.  # 2 paragraphs with 2 and 3 sentences each lorem::ipsum(2, sentences = c(2, 3)) #> <lorem> #> Dolor urna fringilla sociis mus parturient ut. Aliquam convallis #> praesent est quam id per risus eget tempor, at lacus, non, iaculis odio #> pulvinar egestas tempus dictum nam ligula. #>  #> Amet augue malesuada mauris, integer in risus luctus – sodales varius #> posuere etiam tempor. Sociosqu interdum; dui penatibus aliquet tempor #> enim suspendisse vehicula tortor. Magnis sapien vel eleifend, venenatis #> feugiat aenean leo aliquam ultricies.  # 2 paragraphs with short sentences lorem::ipsum(2, avg_words_per_sentence = 4) #> <lorem> #> Sit neque blandit suscipit eu. Cursus facilisis nulla leo aenean. #> Congue magna parturient primis leo! Na leo. #>  #> Consectetur nostra netus eleifend faucibus. Non elementum velit #> ultrices sapien! Urna hac urna venenatis dignissim. Tristique interdum #> nullam egestas vestibulum! Platea proin bibendum sed aptent nam? Na #> nam.  # 2 paragraphs with long sentences lorem::ipsum(2, avg_words_per_sentence = 20) #> <lorem> #> Ipsum nulla libero ut tempus erat tempor pellentesque. Risus et nibh #> volutpat platea, himenaeos dictum; ac nullam sodales! Leo etiam mollis #> eget integer, cubilia, non cum ante commodo semper? Mollis orci ut #> ultrices auctor vestibulum auctor nisl pharetra dictum cubilia tempor #> pretium rutrum gravida dui ligula ullamcorper ut ligula eros sagittis #> eleifend commodo lacus, pulvinar cum – senectus eros ante interdum #> massa, proin litora suscipit pellentesque tempor sociis sagittis #> interdum iaculis cras ligula libero pellentesque semper parturient #> habitant eleifend pharetra. #>  #> Elit venenatis non nisi eget urna ridiculus, eros risus nam inceptos #> pulvinar. Sem pellentesque proin cum pharetra ornare eleifend rutrum #> malesuada orci donec! Interdum diam tincidunt eget massa phasellus arcu #> faucibus maecenas et. Facilisis magnis fames penatibus, augue curabitur #> augue. Consequat praesent egestas ut habitant, at fermentum volutpat #> leo integer? Integer enim vivamus ridiculus iaculis sed nullam duis #> urna nam vulputate mauris iaculis etiam mus justo curae porta a massa, #> urna platea parturient fermentum mus, placerat metus facilisi, quisque, #> penatibus scelerisque dignissim aliquam: orci dapibus: risus laoreet, #> luctus sem, parturient vel nunc semper morbi natoque, venenatis eros #> suscipit curae venenatis maecenas porta rutrum sociosqu mi nascetur sem #> sapien etiam elementum mattis tellus nostra cras feugiat.
